description: Installation of 1 no. internally illuminated digital fascia sign (Advertisement Consent)
decision_conditions: 1st SCHEDULE: CONDITIONS IMPOSED BY THE REGULATIONS
1.	The consent shall expire after a period of 5 years from the date of this notice.
2.	Any advertisements displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
3.	Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition.
4.	Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
5.	No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.

6.	No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of, any road traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, waterway (including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military).
2nd SCHEDULE: CONDITIONS IMPOSED BY AUTHORITY, WITH REASONS
1.	The proposed advertisement must not have any intermittent light source, moving feature, animation or exposed cold cathode tubing;
Reason: In the interests in pedestrian and highway safety.
2.	The frequency of change in the displayed image should be no greater than 10 seconds;
Reason: In the interests in pedestrian and highway safety.

3.	No special visual effects of any kind are permitted during the time that any message is displayed. The displayed image must not include any animated, flashing, scrolling, intermittent or video elements;
Reason: In the interests in pedestrian and highway safety.

4.	No visual effects of any kind are permitted to accompany the transition between any two successive messages. The replacement image must not incorporate any fading, swiping or other animated transitional method;
Reason: In the interests in pedestrian and highway safety.
5.	The sequencing of message relating the same product is prohibited;
Reason: In the interests in pedestrian and highway safety.

6.	The intensity of illumination should be no greater than 400cdm during the daylight hours and 300cdm during the hours of darkness or such lower level of illumination which the council deem appropriate on amenity ground;
Reason: In the interests in pedestrian and highway safety.

7.	The footway and carriageway of the A406 North Circular Road must not be blocked during the installation and maintenance of the proposed advertisement. Temporary obstruction during the installation must be kept to a minimum and should not encroach on the clear space required to provide safe passage for pedestrians, or obstruct the flow of traffic. No ladder/cherry picker shall be erected from the footway/carriageway of A406 for the purpose of servicing/installation of the panel at any time;
Reason: In the interests in pedestrian and highway safety.
8.	No object/fixture of the proposed advertisement shall over sail the TLRN at any time.
Reason: In the interests in pedestrian and highway safety.
